snippet: BlackRock, the world’s largest asset-management company, said it had hired Helen Zhu, a former Goldman Sachs executive, as a managing director and head of its China equities business.
abstract: BlackRock, the world’s largest asset-management company, said it had hired Helen Zhu, a former Goldman Sachs executive, as a managing director and head of its China equities business.

headline.main: BlackRock Hires New Head of China Equities
